cookie.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience. Do you allow us to use your data for Google Analytics and ads?

settings.title: Settings
settings.providersDesc: Enter your API keys. Keys are stored only in your browser, never sent to servers.
settings.mcpDesc: Model Context Protocol server connection status
settings.mcpBuiltinDesc: These servers are automatically attached to agents. Disable any you do not want to use.
settings.mcpCustomDesc: Add your own MCP servers and assign them to any agent.
settings.mcpCorsWarning: Your MCP server must allow requests from izan.io (CORS). Add Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://izan.io to your server's response headers, or the connection will fail.
settings.mcpAssignAgentsDesc: Which agents should have access to this server?
settings.mcpNoCustomServers: No custom MCP servers added yet.
settings.mcpDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server?

home.heroDescription: Deploy agents that deliver. Domain search, trading analysis, news summaries and more. Use any AI model securely—no middleman, no fees, no data stored. Powered by real-world tools via MCP.
home.featureAgentsDesc: Our agents are powered by specialized MCP servers. They don't just talk - they search domains, analyze markets, check prices, and take action.
home.featurePrivacyDesc: No account needed. Your API keys stay in your browser. We never see your data. Fully open source for complete transparency.
home.featureForEveryoneDesc: Other MCP clients live inside code editors. izan.io is a web app - fast to load, easy to use, accessible to everyone.
home.agentShowcaseDesc: Specialized agents that go beyond simple chat. Each one is equipped with real-world tools to deliver actionable results.
home.agentDomainDesc: Search domains, check availability, get smart suggestions for your next project.
home.agentWebSearchDesc: Search the web, gather information, compare and summarize results.
home.agentTradingDesc: Technical analysis with TradingView integration. Chart patterns, indicators, and market insights.
home.agentFootballDesc: Match analysis, team stats, and betting insights powered by football APIs.
home.agentNewsDesc: Daily news summaries, trend analysis, and personalized briefings.
home.agentMoreDesc: Lego finder, travel planner, recipe helper - new agents are always being built.
home.step1Desc: Pick from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and 17+ providers. Use your own API key.
home.step2Desc: Choose a specialized agent for your task - domains, search, trading, and more.
home.step3Desc: The agent uses real tools to deliver actionable, concrete results - not just text.
home.flexDesc: izan.io is built to be extended. Plug in your own tools, create your own agents, and build workflows that fit your needs.
home.flexMcpDesc: Plug in any MCP-compatible server to give agents access to your own tools and data sources.
home.flexCreateDesc: Build agents tailored to your specific use case with custom prompts and tool configurations.
home.flexChainDesc: Link agents to collaborate on complex tasks - one agent's output becomes another's input.
home.flexTestDesc: Test your MCP servers in a real web environment. Model-agnostic, fast to load, and unbiased - no code editor required.
home.roadmapDesc: We're building the future of accessible AI agents. Here's what's on our roadmap.
home.roadmapItem1Desc: Trading, sports, news, shopping - agents for every domain.
home.roadmapItem2Desc: Purpose-built models for specific tasks, integrated directly into agents.
home.roadmapItem3Desc: Run AI models directly in your browser - no API key needed.
home.roadmapItem4Desc: Image and design generation models coming to the platform.
home.roadmapItem5Desc: Share and discover community-built agents and configurations.
home.providersTitle: Use Any AI Model You Want
home.providersDesc: 17+ AI providers, one platform. Bring your own API key - no vendor lock-in, no middleman fees. Your keys never leave your browser.
home.providersCta: Configure your API keys in settings
home.noApiKeyStorage: We never store your API keys
home.privacyDesc: izan.io is fully open source - built for trust and transparency. Your API keys live only in your browser's IndexedDB. Your conversations stay local. We grow with our community, not at their expense.

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.description: Agents integrated with MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Each agent provides access to different tools and automates tasks.
agents.createPlain: A blank agent will be created. You can customize it later.
agents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
agents.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this agent to its default settings?
agents.name: Name
agents.basePromptPlaceholder: Prompt defining the agent's base behavior...

general.name: General Assistant
general.description: General purpose AI assistant. Helps with any topic.
general.detailedDescription: Your everyday AI companion. The General Assistant handles a wide range of tasks - from quick calculations and time checks to generating secure passwords and unique identifiers. Think of it as your smart utility belt: always ready, always helpful, no setup required.
general.whatItDoes: The General Assistant comes with built-in utility tools that let it go beyond simple conversation. It can tell you the current time, perform mathematical calculations, generate cryptographically secure passwords, create UUIDs, and produce random numbers. It's the perfect starting point for anyone new to izan.io.
general.feature1: Instant time and date lookups across timezones
general.feature2: Mathematical calculations from simple arithmetic to complex expressions
general.feature3: Secure password generation with customizable length and complexity
general.feature4: UUID and random number generation for development and testing
general.howToUse: Just start chatting naturally. Ask a question, request a calculation, or ask for a password - the assistant automatically picks the right tool. No configuration needed.
general.proTip: You can combine multiple requests in one message. For example: "Generate a UUID, create a 20-character password, and calculate 15% of 2499."
general.usageExample3: Generate a secure 24-character password with symbols
general.usageExample4: Create 5 UUIDs for my database records

web-search.name: Web Search
web-search.description: Searches the web and gathers information.
web-search.detailedDescription: Your personal research assistant. The Web Search agent doesn't just find links - it actively searches multiple engines, reads through results, compares information from different sources, and delivers clear, summarized answers. Perfect for research, fact-checking, product comparisons, and staying up to date.
web-search.whatItDoes: Powered by both Bing and Google search integrations, this agent performs real web searches in real time. It can find current news, compare products or technologies, research topics in depth, and present findings in a structured, easy-to-digest format. Unlike a simple search engine, it understands context and follow-up questions.
web-search.feature1: Dual search engine coverage - Bing and Google for comprehensive results
web-search.feature2: Real-time information retrieval with current, up-to-date results
web-search.feature3: Multi-source comparison and fact-checking across different websites
web-search.feature4: Structured summaries instead of raw link lists
web-search.howToUse: Ask any question you would normally Google. The agent will search the web, analyze multiple results, and give you a clear summary. You can ask follow-up questions to dig deeper into any topic.
web-search.proTip: For the best results, be specific. Instead of "best phone", try "best phone under $500 for photography in 2026". The agent can also compare things: "Compare Next.js vs Remix for a startup project."
web-search.usageExample1: What are the key differences between ChatGPT and Claude?
web-search.usageExample2: Most popular programming languages in 2026 and why
web-search.usageExample3: React vs Vue vs Svelte - which should I learn first?
web-search.usageExample4: Latest news about AI regulation in Europe
web-search.usageExample5: Best budget mechanical keyboards for programming

domain-expert.name: Domain Expert
domain-expert.description: Domain availability checking and registration insights.
domain-expert.detailedDescription: Your domain name strategist. Whether you're launching a startup, building a side project, or registering a brand, the Domain Expert helps you find the perfect domain name. It checks availability in real time, suggests creative alternatives, and provides pricing information across dozens of extensions.
domain-expert.whatItDoes: Connected to domain registry APIs, this agent can instantly check if a domain is available, look up bulk domains at once, suggest domain names based on keywords, and list all available TLD extensions. It understands naming trends and can help you brainstorm brandable, memorable domain names for any niche.
domain-expert.feature1: Instant domain availability checking with real-time pricing
domain-expert.feature2: Smart domain suggestions based on keywords and your industry
domain-expert.feature3: Bulk domain checking - test dozens of ideas at once
domain-expert.feature4: Full TLD directory with .com, .io, .ai, .dev and 400+ extensions
domain-expert.howToUse: Tell the agent what you're building or the keywords you like, and it will suggest available domains. You can also directly ask to check specific domains or request bulk availability checks.
domain-expert.proTip: Try describing your project instead of just a keyword. "I'm building an AI-powered recipe app" will give you much more creative suggestions than just "recipe". You can also ask for specific TLDs: "Find me available .io domains about fintech."
domain-expert.usageExample1: Is izan.io available? How much does it cost?
domain-expert.usageExample2: Suggest domain names for a pet care startup
domain-expert.usageExample3: Check these domains: techflow.io, techflow.ai, techflow.dev
domain-expert.usageExample4: Find creative .ai domains for a machine learning project
domain-expert.usageExample5: What domain extensions are available for my brand 'cloudpeak'?
